pokemon.name: Pikachu
pokemon.description: A yellow mouse Pokémon with electrical powers.

pokemon.name: Charmander
pokemon.description: A small, lizard-like Pokémon that is primarily orange with blue eyes and a long flame burning at the tip of its tail.

pokemon.name: Squirtle
pokemon.description: A small, turtle-like Pokémon with a blue body and a shell on its back.

pokemon.name: Bulbasaur
pokemon.description: A small, quadruped Pokémon that has blue-green skin with darker patches.

pokemon.name: Jigglypuff
pokemon.description: A round, pink Pokémon that has pointed ears and large, blue eyes.

pokemon.name: Meowth
pokemon.description: A small, feline Pokémon with cream-colored fur and a coin-like charm on its forehead.

pokemon.name: Bellsprout
pokemon.description: A plant-like Pokémon with a green, stem-like body and leaves on its head.

pokemon.name: Gastly
pokemon.description: A ghostly, gaseous Pokémon that appears as a black orb surrounded by a purple haze.

pokemon.name: Diglett
pokemon.description: A small, brown Pokémon that appears to be a mole with a round body and a large, pink nose.

pokemon.name: Psyduck
pokemon.description: A yellow Pokémon resembling a duck or bipedal platypus with a vacant stare.

pokemon.name: Geodude
pokemon.description: A gray, rocky Pokémon with a humanoid shape, muscular arms, and small, black eyes.

pokemon.name: Pidgey
pokemon.description: A small, bird Pokémon with brown plumage on its head and back, and a cream-colored face, underside, and tail.

pokemon.name: Ekans
pokemon.description: A purple, serpentine Pokémon with yellow rings around its body.

pokemon.name: Zubat
pokemon.description: A bat-like Pokémon with blue skin, small eyes, and two pairs of wings.

pokemon.name: Machop
pokemon.description: A gray, humanoid Pokémon with large, red eyes and a heavy brow.
